string.text:
Action plan

Military personnel:
the Commander of the operation, call the Quartet
Seven airborne assault troops: "Sapsan" "Hawk" "Hawk" Kestrel, "Falcon" Grif "LUN".
Sniper calculation: "Owl"
Support:
Air: "the eighteenth-Zero" "zero thirtieth" "Zero thirty-one" "Forty-eight", "forty ninth" "half a second"
"forty first", "Sixty four" "Sixty five" "zero ninety-eight" "zero ninety-seven"
Earth: "Battleship-1" "Battleship-2" "Battleship-3"
Furnished: Possible strong resistance in the area of the bridge(23,45), gate(26,78), the road along the main building of the station(12,23-53,76). Probably the use of the enemy's heavy weapons.
the Expected strength of the enemy 70 - 100. The presence of armored vehicles - no.
Possible heavy sniper cover from the enemy.
Weather: Visibility - 700, the presence of previously unknown anomalies.
